item.title: UC Berkeley AI Community
item.description: The UC Berkeley AI Community - this is the original page for the AI Community. Now that the AI Community has grown and come out of incubation, this page will retire from the CTO site and move in summer 2025 to a new campus AI Hub.

item.title: Conference Notes — Language and AI: Generating Interdisciplinary Connections and Possibilities at Berkeley
item.description: Notes from the conference hosted by the Berkeley Language Center and the Townsend Center’s Language and AI working group exploring interdisciplinary connections between language, culture, and AI.

item.title: Governance and Community for AI at Berkeley
item.description: An overview of Berkeley’s approach to AI governance and community engagement, balancing innovation with responsible implementation through foundational governance, community building, and functional governance.

item.title: Launching the UC Berkeley AI Community and the Berkeley AI Meetup
item.description: Announcement of the creation of the UC Berkeley AI Community, replacing the Cloud Computing Community of Practice to focus on the university’s evolving needs in artificial intelligence.
